Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
io.mygame.common.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameManager extends Object implements Serializable
The GameManager class is responsible for managing game state, player data, and game settings. It holds information about the player's progress, including discovered areas, NPC interactions, and sound settings. The GameManager follows a singleton pattern.
